text:
Purpose-built SaaS applications
provide more options than ever before
to optimize your teams’ productivity.

These applications make employees more
productive and more satisfied with their jobs.

As a result, the average organization
licenses over 100 SaaS applications.

But applications from different
vendors aren’t built to work together,

creating data silos that make it harder
to secure and manage corporate data

and cumbersome for employees constantly
switching between applications
to find content or perform tasks.
Some organizations try to solve this

by creating point-to-point
integrations between each application.

Still, those take weeks or months to
develop, and cost even more to maintain.

AWS AppFabric is a fully managed
service that quickly connects
SaaS applications across your organization
with no development required.

IT and security teams can easily manage and
secure applications using a standard schema,

and employees can complete everyday
tasks faster using generative AI.

AppFabric eliminates the
complexity of building

and maintaining point-to-point
SaaS-app integrations

and helps improve security posture by providing
better visibility across application data.

AppFabric aggregates and normalizes
data into a common repository,

so setting common policies
and alerts and managing user access
across different applications is easier.

AppFabric also lets you use
generative AI to surface insights,

create content, or perform other
tasks spanning multiple applications,

connecting content to increase
productivity and collaboration.

Easily connect your SaaS applications for
better productivity and security today!
